definition source source_url: Biology is the science of life. It is concerned with the characteristics and behaviors of organisms  Modern Science Ontology  https://w3id.org/skgo/modsci#Biology
Study of the planet earth, its composition, structure, physical and chemical processes, and history since its origin  USGS Thesaurus  https://apps.usgs.gov/thesaurus/USGSThesaurus/geology
Study of life in past geologic time based on fossil plants and animals  USGS Thesaurus  https://apps.usgs.gov/thesaurus/USGSThesaurus/paleontology
